name: CUBE - ation
description:
Video game made for Eli and Badduck 's jam !

The game's main mechanic is the gravity

--------Controls--------

ZQSD / WASD / Arrows - Move
Left click - curved shot
Right click - bouncing ball  (activated  after 1 bounce)
F5 - restart current level

--------Note--------
If you get stuck in wall, don't worry !
you can jump out of it or just press F5 to restart the level.

--------Credits--------
As always thank you Yann Roland for your music,
and Eli for the jam asset.
 I just coded the game and made some odd noises

(Project file available)
